document.full_text: lebanon's hezbollah leader sayyed hassan nasrallah said on wednesday most syrians still backed president bashar al-assad and the removal of his regime on the back of mass unrest would serve u.s. and israeli interests.
document.title: lebanon's hezbollah says most syrians back assad
lines_and_colors: lebanon's hezbollah leader sayyed hassan nasrallah said on wednesday most syrians still backed president bashar al-assad and the removal of his regime on the back of mass unrest would serve u.s. and israeli interests.
